description: This file implements a React component for viewing and editing a note, and server-side loader and action functions for fetching, updating, and deleting notes via an API. It manages note data, user session validation, and form handling in a Remix-run environment.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Fetches the note data for a given note ID after validating user session.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Handles form submissions to update or delete a note based on client intent.

methods.name: NoteDetail
methods.description: React component rendering the note editing form with delete functionality.
